parameters.name: Source_IP
parameters.label: Source IP
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| summarize Count = count()/1000 by SourceIP
| where SourceIP != ""
| order by Count desc, SourceIP asc
| project Value = SourceIP, Label = strcat(SourceIP, " - ", Count, "k"), Selected = false

parameters.name: Destination_IP
parameters.label: Destination IP
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| summarize Count = count()/1000 by DestinationIP
| where DestinationIP != ""
| order by Count desc, DestinationIP asc
| project Value = DestinationIP, Label = strcat(DestinationIP, " - ", Count, "k"), Selected = false

parameters.name: EventClass
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| distinct DeviceEventClassID

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP})
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where "{EventClass:lable}" == "All" or "{EventClass:lable}" == "All" or DeviceEventClassID in ({EventClass});
data
| summarize Count = count() by Activity
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Activity)
 on Activity
| project-away Activity1, TimeGenerated
| extend Activitys = Activity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend Activity = 'All', Activitys = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Activities, by volume

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP})
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where "{EventClass:lable}" == "All" or DeviceEventClassID in ({EventClass})
| where '{activities}' == "All" or Activity == '{activities}'
| summarize LogVolume=count() by DeviceEventClassID, bin_at(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:start})
content.title: Event trend, by time

content.query:
//trend by sevearity
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where "{EventClass:lable}" == "All" or DeviceEventClassID in ({EventClass})
| where '{activities}' == "All" or Activity == '{activities}'
| summarize count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain},{TimeRange:start}), LogSeverity
content.title: Events severity, by time

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where Activity =~ "Traffic";
data
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceEventClassID
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by DeviceEventClassID)
 on DeviceEventClassID
| project-away DeviceEventClassID1, TimeGenerated
| extend DeviceEventClassIDs = DeviceEventClassID
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend DeviceEventClassID = 'All', DeviceEventClassIDs = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Device events Id summary - click to filter the graph below

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where Activity =~ "Traffic";
data
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceAction
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by DeviceAction)
 on DeviceAction
| project-away DeviceAction1, TimeGenerated
| extend DeviceAction = DeviceAction
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend DeviceAction = 'All', DeviceActions = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Device action summary - click to filter the graph below

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| where '{EventClass}' == "All" or DeviceEventClassID=='{EventClass}'
| summarize EventCount= count() by DeviceAction, bin_at(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:start})
content.title: Device action, by time

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where '{DeviceAction}' == "All" or DeviceAction=='{DeviceAction}'
| where Activity =~ "Traffic"
| summarize EventCount= count() by DeviceEventClassID, bin_at(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:start})
content.title: Device events Id, by time

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks' 
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC' 
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'end' 
| extend Reason = coalesce(
                            column_ifexists("Reason", ""),
                            extract(';reason=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions),
                            ""
                        )
| summarize ReasonCount= count() by  Reason, TimeGenerated
content.title: Reasons for session ending, by time

content.query:
// Data sent outbound vs inbound
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| extend Direction=iff(DeviceCustomString4=~'Trust','Outbound' ,'Inbound' )
| summarize DataSentOutBoundMB=sumif(SentBytes, Direction=~'Outbound')/1048576,   DataRecievedInboundMB=sumif(ReceivedBytes, Direction=~'Inbound')/1048576 by TimeGenerated
content.title: Sent and received data, by volume

items.name: Sent and received data by volume

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID  =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction contains 'block'
| summarize ProtocolCount=count()  by ApplicationProtocol
| top 5 by ProtocolCount desc
content.title: Top 5 blocked URLs, by application protocol

items.name: Top 5 blocked URLs by application protocol

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID  =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction in ('block-url', 'block-continue')
| summarize CategoryCount=count() by DeviceCustomString2
| project-rename CategoryName= DeviceCustomString2
| top 5 by CategoryCount
content.title: Top 5 URL blocked, by category

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction in ('block-url', 'block-continue')
| summarize URLCount=count() by RequestURL
| top 5 by URLCount desc

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP})

content.title: URL threat event summary

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction contains 'block'
| extend PAReferer= extract(';PanOSReferer=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions)
| where PAReferer !=''
| summarize RefererCount= count() by PAReferer
| top 5 by RefererCount desc
content.title: Top 5 referrers for blocked URLs

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'wildfire'
| summarize ActionCount=count() by DeviceAction, TimeGenerated
content.title: Wildfire events, by time

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~'wildfire'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP});
data
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceAction
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by DeviceAction)
 on DeviceAction
| project-away DeviceAction1, TimeGenerated
| extend DeviceActions = DeviceAction
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend DeviceAction = 'All', DeviceActions = '*' 
)
| project DeviceAction, Count, Trend
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 5 Wildfire activities

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~'wildfire'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP});
data
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceCustomString2
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by DeviceCustomString2)
 on DeviceCustomString2
| project-away DeviceCustomString21, TimeGenerated
| extend DeviceCustomString2s = DeviceCustomString2
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend DeviceCustomString2 = 'All', DeviceCustomString2s = '*' 
)
| project DeviceCustomString2, Count, Trend
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 5 Wildfire verdicts

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'wildfire'
| where '{DeviceAction}' == "All" or DeviceAction=='{DeviceAction}'
| where '{DeviceString}' == "All" or DeviceCustomString2=='{DeviceString}'
| project TimeGenerated, ReceiptTime, LogSeverity, DeviceAction, ['URL Category'] =DeviceCustomString2, DestinationPort, DestinationIP, Message, SourcePort, SourceIP, DestinationUserID, RequestURL
content.title: Wildfire events

CommonSecurityLog

 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where DeviceEventClassID  =~ 'file'
| where DeviceAction contains 'deny'
| summarize ProtocolCount=count()  by ApplicationProtocol
| top 5 by ProtocolCount desc

content.query:
//Palo Alto File Category By Action Summary
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks' 
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'file' 
| extend PACategory= coalesce(
                            column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),
                            extract(';cat=(.*?)($|;)',1,AdditionalExtensions),
                            ""
                        )
| summarize CategoryCount=count() by PACategory
| sort by CategoryCount
content.title: Summary of Palo Alto file categories, by activity

items.name: Summary of Palo Alto file categories by activity

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~'file'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP});
data
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceAction
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by DeviceAction)
 on DeviceAction
| project-away DeviceAction1, TimeGenerated
| extend DeviceActions = DeviceAction
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend DeviceAction = 'All', DeviceActions = '*' 
)
| project DeviceAction, Count, Trend
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Summary of file type activities

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (DeviceProduct has 'PAN-OS'
 or DeviceProduct  has 'LF'
 )| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'file'
| where "{Destination_IP:lable}"=="All" or DestinationIP in ({Destination_IP}) 
| where "{Source_IP:lable}" == "All" or SourceIP in ({Source_IP})
| where '{SelectedDA}' == "All" or DeviceAction == '{SelectedDA}'
| summarize ActionCount=count() by DeviceAction, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Compare allowed and denied files, by time

items.name: Compare allowed and denied files by time
